children.value: 35. Write a C program to find upper triangular matrix.

Enter 9 co-efficients of the matrix-
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9
The given matrix is
 1 2 3
 4 5 6
 7 8 9

Setting zero in upper triangular matrix

 1 0 0
 4 5 0
 7 8 9
